message:
Dear all, I need your advice, 
what is the best collage or university for making a master in cyber security in Egypt, and how can I work in this field in egypt,
my qualification is :
I have a bachelor of communication and electronics from El shorouk academy, and I know about:

web: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, Ajax, PHP, MySql.
Android Developing, 
Embedded Systems: C language, advanced C, embedded C, AVR micro controller, 
Programming language: C, Java.

Is the master will be good for me because I am a geek of security, penetration systems, and this kind of stuff, or I can achieve it with another better way.
